name: Petzl Freelock Ice Tool Leash
description: The same excellent leash that comes with the Petzl® Charlet Aztar tools, available separately for retrofitting to any other tool.Locks down automatically and opens with a sideways sweep of the hand (note that accidental release is always a possibility with one-handed leashes.)Cinches down with one handed downward pressure.Moulded foam hand cradle for comfort.Adjustment buckle allows customising the tightness of the cinch.
